scenes.background: Bob crosses his arms and looks at Monica thoughtfully.
scenes.description: 'I understand, but we need to be practical. A simpler plan might work best.'

options.text: Maybe we can simplify the plan but still include some variety.
options.analysis: You suggested a balanced approach, showing good perception and social skills, but empathy and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: Simplicity is key, but we can add elements that everyone enjoys.
options.analysis: You focused on incorporating enjoyable elements while keeping it simple, showing good self-regulation and empathy, but social skills and perception were moderate.

options.text: I think simplifying will make it easier for everyone to relax and have fun.
options.analysis: You highlighted the benefits of simplicity, showing good empathy and motivation, but social skills and perception were lower.
